GR14yamsr_au:3: nāthāya nātha-munaye 'tra paratra cā7pi nityaṃ yadīya-caraṇau śaraṇaṃ madīyam || YStr_2 ||
GR14yamsr_au:9: saṃdarśayan niramimīta purāṇa-ratnaṃ tasmai namo muni-virāya parāśarāya ||
GR14yamsr_au:11: mātā pitā yuvatayas tanayā vibhūtiḥ sarvaṃ yad eva niyamena mad-anvayānām
GR14yamsr_au:12: ādyasya naḥ kula-pater vakulā1bhirāmaṃ śrīmat tad-aṅghri-yugalaṃ praṇamāmi mūrdhnā || YStr_5
GR14yamsr_au:13: yan mūrdhni me śruti-śirassu ca bhāti yasminn asman-mano-ratha-pathaḥ
GR14yamsr_au:15: stoṣyāmi naḥ kula-dhanaṃ kula-daivataṃ tat pādā3ravindam
GR14yamsr_au:17: tattvena yasya mahimā1rṇava-śīkarā1ṇuḥ śakyo na mātum api
GR14yamsr_au:18: kartuṃ tadīya-mahima-stutim udyatāya mahyaṃ namo 'stu kavaye nirapatrapāya || YStr_7 ||
GR14yamsr_au:19: yad vā śramā1vadhi yathā-mati vā9py aśaktaḥ staumy evam eva khalu te 'pi
GR14yamsr_au:21: vedāś catur mukha-mukhāś ca; mahā2rṇavā1ntaḥ ko majjator aṇu-kulā1calayor
GR14yamsr_au:23: kiṃ cai7ṣa śakty-atiśayena na te 'nukampyaḥ stotā9pi tu stuti-kṛtena
GR14yamsr_au:25: tatra śramas tu sulabho mama manda-buddher ity udyamo 'yam ucito mama cā7bja-netra ! || YStr_9 ||
GR14yamsr_au:26: nā7vekṣase tyadi tato bhuvanāny amūni nā7laṃ prabho bhavitum eva kutaḥ pravṛttiḥ ? |
GR14yamsr_au:27: evaṃ nisarga-suhṛdi tvayi sarva-jantâüḥ svāmin ! citram idam āśrita-vatsalatvam || YStr_10
GR14yamsr_au:28: svābhāvikā1navadhikā1tiśaye3śitṛtvaṃ nārāyaṇa ! tvayi na mṛṣyati vaidikaḥ kaḥ ? |
GR14yamsr_au:29: brahmā śivaḥ śatamakhaḥ parama-sva-rāḍ ity ete 'pi yasya
GR14yamsr_au:31: kaś śrīḥ śriyaḥ ? parama-sattva-samāśrayaḥ kaḥ ? kaḥ puṇḍarīka-nayanaḥ ?
GR14yamsr_au:34: ko 'nyaḥ prajā-paśu-patī paripāti ? kasya pādo1dakena sa śivaḥ sva-śiro-dhṛtena ? || YStr_13
GR14yamsr_au:35: kasyo7dare hara-viriñca-mukhaḥ prapañcaḥ ? ko rakṣatī7mam ? aja-niṣṭa ca kasya nābheḥ ? |
GR14yamsr_au:36: krāntvā nigīrya punar udgirati tvad-anyaḥ kaḥ ? kena vai9ṣa paravān iti śakya-śaṅkaḥ ? tvāṃ śīla-rūpa-caritaiḥ parama-prakṛṣṭa-sattvena sāttvikatayā prabalaiś ca
GR14yamsr_au:42: māyā-balena bhavatā9pi niguhyamānaṃ paśyanti kecid aniśaṃ
GR14yamsr_au:44: yad aṇḍam aṇḍā1ntara-gocaraṃ ca yad-daśo1ttarāṇy āvaraṇāni yāni ca |
GR14yamsr_au:45: guṇāḥ pradhānaṃ puruṣaḥ paraṃ padaṃ parāt paraṃ brahma ca te vibhūtayaḥ ||
GR14yamsr_au:46: vaśī vadānyo guṇavān ṛjuḥ śucir mṛdur dayālur madhuraḥ sthiraḥ samaḥ |
GR14yamsr_au:47: kṛtī kṛta-jñas tvam api svabhāvataḥ samasta-kalyāṇa-guṇā1mṛto1dadhiḥ ||
GR14yamsr_au:48: upary upary abja-bhuvo 'pi pūruṣān prakalpya te ye śatam ity anukramāt |
GR14yamsr_au:49: giras tvad ekai1ka-guṇā1vdhīpsayā sadā sthitā no7dyamato 'tiśerate ||
GR14yamsr_au:52: namo namo vāṅ-manasā2tibhūmaye namo namo vāṅ-manasai2ka-bhūmaye |
GR14yamsr_au:54: na dharma-niṣṭho 'smi, na cā8tma-vedī, na bhaktimāṃs tvac-caraṇā3ravinde |
GR14yamsr_au:56: na ninditaṃ karma tad asti loke sahasraśo yan na mayā vyadhāyi |
GR14yamsr_au:57: so 'haṃ vipākā1vasare mukunda ! krandāmi sampraty agatis tavā7gre ||
GR14yamsr_au:58: nimajjato 'nanta ! bhavā1rṇavā1ntaś cirāya me kūlam ivā7si labdhaḥ |
GR14yamsr_au:59: tvayā9pi labdhaṃ bhagavann idānīm anuttamaṃ pātram idaṃ dayāyāḥ || YStr_24
GR14yamsr_au:60: abhūta-pūrvaṃ mama bhāvi kiṃ vā sarvaṃ sahe me sahajaṃ hi duḥkham |
GR14yamsr_au:61: kiṃ tu tvad-agre śaraṇāgatānāṃ parā-bhavo nātha ! na te 'nurūpaḥ ||
GR14yamsr_au:62: nirāsakasyā7pi na tāvad utsahe maheśa ! hātuṃ tava pāda-paṅkajam |
GR14yamsr_au:63: ruṣā nirasto 'pi śiśuḥ stanandhayo na jātu mātuś caraṇau jihāsati ||
GR14yamsr_au:64: tavā1mṛta-syandini pāda-kaṅkaje niveśitā3tmā katham anyad icchati |
GR14yamsr_au:65: sthite 'ravinde makaranda-nirbhare madhu-vrato ne7kṣurakaṃ hi vīkṣate ||
GR14yamsr_au:66: tvad-aṅghrim uddiśya kadā9pi kenacid yathā tathā vā9pi sakṛt kuto 'ñjaliḥ
GR14yamsr_au:67: tadai9va muṣṇāty aśubhāby aśeṣataḥ śubhāni puṣṇāti na jātu hīyate ||
GR14yamsr_au:68: udīrṇa-saṃsāra-davā1śuśukṣaṇiṃ kṣaṇena nirvāpya parāṃ ca nirvṛtim |
GR14yamsr_au:71: dhanaṃ madīyaṃ tava pāda-paṅkajaṃ kadā nu sākṣāt-karavāṇi cakṣuṣā ? ||
GR14yamsr_au:75: cakāsataṃ jyā-kiṇa-karkaśaiḥ śubhaiś caturbhir ājānu-vilambhir bhuhaiḥ |
GR14yamsr_au:80: cakartha yasyā bhavanaṃ bhujā1ntaraṃ tava priyaṃ dhāma yadīya-janma-bhūḥ |
GR14yamsr_au:81: jagat-samastaṃ yad-apāṅga-saṃśrayaṃ yad-artham ambhodhir amanthy abandhi
GR14yamsr_au:84: guṇena rūpeṇa vilāsa-ceṣṭitais sadā tavai7vo7citayā tava śriyā || YStr_38
GR14yamsr_au:86: śarīra-bhedais tava śeṣatāṃ gatair yatho2citaṃ śṣa itī8rite janaiḥ ||
GR14yamsr_au:87: dāsas sakhā vāhanam āsanaṃ dhvajo yas te vitānaṃ vyajanaṃ trayī-mayaḥ |
GR14yamsr_au:90: priyeṇa senāpatinā nyavedi tat-tathā2nujānantam udāra-vīkṣanaiḥ || YStr_42
GR14yamsr_au:95: śriyaḥ śriyaṃ bhakta-janai1ka-jīvitaṃ samartham āpat-sakham arthi-kalpakam
GR14yamsr_au:98: dhig aśucim avinītaṃ nirbhayaṃ mām alajjaṃ parama-puruṣa yo 'ham
GR14yamsr_au:99: vidh-śiva-sanakā3dyair dhyātum atyanta-dūraṃ tava parijana-bhāvaṃ kāmaye
GR14yamsr_au:102: atagiṃ śaraṇāgataṃ hare kṛpayā kevalam ātma-sāt-kuru || YStr_48 ||
GR14yamsr_au:104: bhagavan bhava-durdine pathaḥ skhalitaṃ mām avalokayā7ciyuta || YStr_49 ||
GR14yamsr_au:105: na mṛṣā paramā1rtham eva me śṛnu vijñāpanam ekam agrataḥ |
GR14yamsr_au:106: yadi me na dayiṣyase tato dayanīyas tava nātha durlabhaḥ || YStr_50 ||
GR14yamsr_au:107: tad ahaṃ tvad ṛte na nāthavān mad ṛte tvaṃ dayanīyavān na ca |
GR14yamsr_au:108: vidhi-nirmitam etam anvayaṃ bhagavān palaya mā sma jīhapaḥ || YStr_51 ||
GR14yamsr_au:109: vapur-ādiṣu yo 'pi ko 'pi vā guṇato 'sāni yathā-tathā-vidhaḥ |
GR14yamsr_au:110: tad ayaṃ tava pāda-padmayor aham adyai7va mayā samarpitaḥ || YStr_52 ||
GR14yamsr_au:111: mama nātha yad asti yo 'smy ahaṃ sakalaṃ tad dhi tavai7va mādhava |
GR14yamsr_au:112: niyata-svam iti prabuddha-dhīr atha vā kiṃ nu samarpayāmi te || YStr_53 ||
GR14yamsr_au:113: avabodhitavān imāṃ yathā mayi nityāṃ bhavadīyatāṃ svayam |
GR14yamsr_au:114: kṛpayai9vam ananya-bhogyatāṃ bhagavan bhaktim api prayaccha me || YStr_54
GR14yamsr_au:115: tava dāsya-sukhai1ka-saṅghināṃ bhavaneṣu astv api kīṭa-janma me |
GR14yamsr_au:116: itarā1vasatheṣu mā sma bhūd api me janma catur-mukhā3tmanā || YStr_55 ||
GR14yamsr_au:118: mahā4tmabhir mām avalokyatāṃ naya kṣaṇe 'pi te yad viraho 'tidussahaḥ ||
GR14yamsr_au:119: na dehaṃ na prāṇān na ca sukham aśeṣā1bhilaṣitaṃ $ na cā8tmānaṃ nā7nyat ki api tava śeṣatva-vibhavāt
GR14yamsr_au:120: bahir-bhūtaṃ nātha kṣaṇam api sahe yātu śatadhā % vināśaṃ tat satyaṃ
GR14yamsr_au:124: dayā-sindho bandho niravadhika-vātsalya-jaladhe % tava smāraṃ smāraṃ
GR14yamsr_au:126: anicchann apy evaṃ yadi punar itī7cchann iva rajas-tamaś-channac
GR14yamsr_au:128: tathā9pī7tthaṃ-rūpaṃ vacanam avalambyā7pi kṛpayā tvam evai7vam-bhūtaṃ
GR14yamsr_au:130: pitā tvaṃ mātā tvaṃ dayita-tanayas tvaṃ priya-suhṛt tvam eva tvaṃ mitram gurur asi gatiś cā7si jagatām |
GR14yamsr_au:131: tvadīyas tvad-hbṛtyas tava parijanas tvad-gatir ahaṃ prapannaś cai7vaṃ
GR14yamsr_au:132: saty aham api tavai7vā7smi hi bharaḥ || YStr_60 ||
GR14yamsr_au:133: janitvā9haṃ vaṃśe mahati jagati khyaata-yaśasāṃ $ śucīnāṃ yuktānāṃ guṇa-puruṣa-tattva-sthiti-vidām
GR14yamsr_au:136: amaryādaḥ kṣudraś cala-matir asūya-prasava-bhūḥ kṛta-ghno durmānī
GR14yamsr_au:138: nṛ-śaṃsaḥ pāpiṣṭhaḥ katham aham ito duḥkha-jala-dher apārād uttīrṇas tava
GR14yamsr_au:140: raghuvara yad abhūs tvaṃ tādṛśo vāyasasya praṇata iti dayālur yac ca caidyasya kṛṣṇa |
GR14yamsr_au:141: pratibhavam aparāddhur mugdha sāyujyado 'bhūr vada kim apadam āgas tasya te 'si kṣamāyāḥ nanu prapannas sakṛd eva nātha tavā7haṃ asmī7ti ca yācamānaḥ |
GR14yamsr_au:142: tavā7nukampyas smartaḥ pratijñānāṃ mad-eka-varjaṃ kim idaṃ vrataṃ te ||
